uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

address_subtype.description: The type of management address identifier encoding used in the 'address' field. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocManAddrSubtype, lldpRemManAddrSubtype)

address.description: The string value used to identify the management address component associated with the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocManAddr, lldpRemManAddr)

interface_id_subtype.description: The enumeration value that identifies the interface numbering method used for defining the interface number, associated with the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocManAddrIfSubtype, lldpRemManAddrIfSubtype)

interface_id.description: The integer value used to identify the interface number regarding the management address component associated with the system. LLDP-MIB (lldpLocManAddrIfId, lldpRemManAddrIfId)
